title: Dev Rush
about: Join the coding frenzy! Dev-Rush Hackathon: Show your web dev skills, win surprises! October 26 - November 21, 2023.

title: Penguin Talks
about: Get ready to break the ice at ALiAS' "Ask Me Anything" event, where students introduce themselves and dive into interactive conversations, turning strangers into friends!

title: FigMaster
about: Embark on a creative journey at ALiAS's FIGMA workshop, your gateway to the world of UI/UX design, unraveling the power of digital innovation.

title: Git Mania II
about: This event turned our tech enthusiasts into Git masters, blending interactive learning and hands-on sessions.

title: Git Mania I
about: This event turned our tech enthusiasts into Git masters, blending interactive learning and hands-on sessions.

title: Kickstarter
about: ALiAS orchestrated "Kickstarter," an event where our Alumni introduced freshers to diverse technology domains and coding strategies.

title: Linux Install Fest
about: ALiAS organized a successful Linux Install Fest for first-year students, enriching the tech community with hands-on open-source experience.
